body_html:
@dr4b My original motivation for changing them was to make the doc parseable by Protobuf. Unescaped double quotes would mess up the parser. The parser also has the problem that you can't handle quoted newlines. I have a pull request I am working on for that.

Currently the above hasn't been a problem because the docs aren't exposed in the protobuf, but removing a single line can expose them. This can prove beneficial for certain applications.

body:
@dr4b  My original motivation for changing them was to make the doc parseable by Protobuf. Unescaped double quotes would mess up the parser. The parser also has the problem that you can't handle quoted newlines. I have a pull request I am working on for that.

Currently the above hasn't been a problem because the docs aren't exposed in the protobuf, but removing a single line can expose them. This can prove beneficial for certain applications.
